response: Additionally, the area to be fenced must not be easily accessible by vehicles (inclination of more than 35 percent) and must be at risk from afforestation.
answer: In addition, the fenced-off area is not allowed to be farmable with a tractor (gradient of over 35 per cent) and must therefore be threatened with afforestation.

response: As the mood intensified, soldiers were given a directive through internal radio communications: "If the masses offer more than three times resistance, shoot them dead." This information was revealed by TIME magazine in an official document which was not released to local media.
answer: As tempers grew more heated, an order was sent to the soldiers through internal radio: "If the masses offer resistance more than three times, shoot them dead," it said, according to an official document seen by TIME that has not been released to the local media.

response: He is the owner, “everything in the end runs through my table”.
answer: He is master of construction: "In the end, everything here passes by my desk".
